short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all Chinese characters with pinyin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces Chinese hànzì with their pīnyīn equivalents for ABCs like me who aren't able to read Chinese characters.

1.3
Added enable/disable toggle button
